topic.title: Windows 10 takes screenshots of your desktop and sends it to MS
topic.body:
Watch it here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1G9s2eptrshvMmXaR1egEnGcbL9WdeQFAa/index2.html

2_14oqzN7fCAtc3RPUWL4sKqEfkVFYHbZyyF.body: So, as it is free speech forum I suggest it firstly adding Newsfeed button. http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1_1M5ztUWkCMP5Pv7MjwApWT7CNvWimGFaFa/How+to+update+existing+ZeroTalk+clone

1_17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr.body:
> [melic](#comment_1_1BWsVpXFVzcpYwdgKhjCRuTx3xDTxyevKS): It seems inevitable to me since block-chains going viral, the rise of cooperatives, the widespread use of community currencies, increasing interest in ideas like universal income, and the fact that people are paying attention to progressive candidates again shows that this is already happening.

Yes, but that is too slow, and crisis goes faster.
You all probably have seen it, but anyway) https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Pq-S557XQU

> [ace](#comment_1_1An7ATsNMMNqRgSgB2upWwbpXgFXQ9E2XD): My test comment

Yep, it worked.

1_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body: I mean 'following' not 'seeding'. BTW, 174 peers in bit.no.com is an error, it will be fix soon, though)

2_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body:
> [muja](#comment_5_17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr): The parody is down. Here's a mirror and another version.

http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=es8cau&s=9

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_rKYgUeWwfyaFgwM04wVnB4MnM/view?pref=2&pli=1

"https://www.dropbox.com/s/4j3ubg6mq5wqw2v/PayPal 2016 Big Game Commercial - “There’s a New Money in Town”.mp4?dl=0"

3_17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr.body: Agreed. Patents are pure evil though.

3_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body: Governance is not automated there rather than improved. Humans are still in power, but blockchain watch them to strict their claims and pledges. You may read this new article also: https://medium.com/@EricRSammons/rise-of-the-machines-blockchain-based-governance-91d05a332cdb#.71r2xewyp

This is governance of a communty (decentralized organisation/company), not a country. Such a community needs to scale many many times before it can deal with some contry's government. Until then it is better for them to stay relativly quiet).

4_17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr.body: I would continue to live normal live if I could do it. BTW, watch 'The Age of Adaline' movie.

5_17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr.body: FireFox. Used to use SRWare Iron, but it has problems with russian letters in gmail attacments.

4_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body:
Does anyone know a software to delete spying tools from Windows 7?
I did not plan to use Win 10 anyway, but need Win 7 for work.
